snippet.title: HORROR HOUSE Creation | "STRANGER" on Steam | Unreal Engine 5
snippet.description:
Creation timelapse with captions explaining the creation for the location of the first map in the upcoming steam title "STRANGER."
------------------------
WISHLIST STRANGER NOW: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1902150/STRANGER/
------------------------
Join STRANGER's discord to discuss the lore and solve the mysteries and hidden messages in this video and the game!
https://discord.gg/73eeU6pr7b
------------------------
STRANGER is a VR and First Person LORE-driven horror game from the maker of SafeZoneVR where you will be defending your house against an unknown enemy. Make use of the provided locks and lock the windows when you hear the Stranger nearby. Make it to 6 am when the police arrive to find yourself uncovering the mystery that lies behind this STRANGER.

You can choose different levels of difficulty and choose from different maps and uncover the story of your player, the STRANGER, and more. Hidden stories and lore-driven cryptic messages will be left to be discovered.
-----------------------
You can currently use ue5 under a beta edition on the epic games store. I show the true power of the new utilities such as nanite and luminous lighting in this video and use new lighting systems to create lighting that looks great and a cinematic insane-looking environment. I spent 4 hours and recorded all of it and put it into a timelapse at 4000x speed. 

Intro 0:00
Timelapse 0:04
Final Result 3:16
#gamedevelopment #stranger #horror
